languages.text: Дьявольская иллюминация смущает многие умы, внушая тревожные видения и пробуждая странные недуги. Даже Вольный Торговец не в силах сопротивляться влиянию коварной, выжигающей душу красоты и еще долго мучается мигренями.

traits.locale_text: Дьявольская иллюминация смущает многие умы, внушая тревожные видения и пробуждая странные недуги. Даже Вольный Торговец не в силах сопротивляться влиянию коварной, выжигающей душу красоты и еще долго мучается мигренями.

languages.text: The devilish illumination confounds many minds, causing alarming visions and awakening strange ailments. Not even the Rogue Trader is capable of overcoming the influence of the insidious, soul-burning beauty. A long period of migraines awaits.
languages.original_text: Дьявольская иллюминация смущает многие умы, внушая тревожные видения и пробуждая странные недуги. Даже Вольный Торговец не в силах сопротивляться влиянию коварной, выжигающей душу красоты и еще долго мучается мигренями.

traits.locale_text: The devilish illumination confounds many minds, causing alarming visions and awakening strange ills. Not even the Rogue Trader is capable of overcoming the influence of the insidious, soul-burning beauty. A long period of migraines awaits.

The devilish illumination confounds many minds, causing alarming visions and awakening strange ills. Not even the Rogue Trader is capable of overcoming the influence of the insidious, soul-burning beauty. A long period of migraines awaits.

The devilish illumination confounds many minds, causing alarming visions and awakening strange ailments. Not even the Rogue Trader is capable of overcoming the influence of the insidious, soul-burning beauty. A long period of migraines awaits.

The devilish illumination confounds many minds, causing alarming visions and awakening strange ailments. Not even the Rogue Trader is capable of overcoming the influence of the insidious, soul-burning beauty. A long period of migraines awaits.

The devilish illumination confounds many minds, causing alarming visions and awakening strange ailments. Not even the Rogue Trader is capable of overcoming the influence of the insidious, soul-burning beauty. A long period of migraines awaits.

languages.text: 恶魔般的光亮蛊惑了许多人的心灵，导致了可怕的幻觉和奇怪的疾病。即便是行商浪人本人，也无法抵御这种邪恶美景灼烧灵魂的影响。在很长一段时间内，你都遭受了偏头痛的折磨。
languages.original_text: The devilish illumination confounds many minds, causing alarming visions and awakening strange ailments. Not even the Rogue Trader is capable of overcoming the influence of the insidious, soul-burning beauty. A long period of migraines awaits.

traits.locale_text: 恶魔般的光亮蛊惑了许多人的心灵，导致了可怕的幻觉和奇怪的疾病。即便是行商浪人本人，也无法抵御这种邪恶美景灼烧灵魂的影响。在很长一段时间内，你都遭受了偏头痛的折磨。

languages.text: 悪魔のような光は多くの人の心を混乱させ、驚くべき幻視を見せ、奇妙な病を引き起こす。自由開拓者でさえ、陰湿で魂を焼くような美の影響に打ち勝つことができない。治まらぬ偏頭痛に悩まされるのだ。
languages.original_text: The devilish illumination confounds many minds, causing alarming visions and awakening strange ailments. Not even the Rogue Trader is capable of overcoming the influence of the insidious, soul-burning beauty. A long period of migraines awaits.

traits.locale_text: 悪魔のような光は多くの人の心を混乱させ、驚くべき幻視を見せ、奇妙な病を引き起こす。自由開拓者でさえ、陰湿で魂を焼くような美の影響に打ち勝つことができない。治まらぬ偏頭痛に悩まされるのだ。

languages.text: La diabólica iluminación confunde a muchas mentes, provocando visiones alarmantes y despertando extrañas dolencias. Ni siquiera {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente es capaz de superar la influencia de la insidiosa belleza que quema el alma. Le espera un largo periodo de migrañas.
languages.original_text: The devilish illumination confounds many minds, causing alarming visions and awakening strange ailments. Not even the Rogue Trader is capable of overcoming the influence of the insidious, soul-burning beauty. A long period of migraines awaits.

traits.locale_text: La diabólica iluminación confunde a muchas mentes, provocando visiones alarmantes y despertando extrañas dolencias. Ni siquiera {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente es capaz de superar la influencia de la insidiosa belleza que {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quema{/g} el alma. Le espera un largo periodo de migrañas.

languages.text: Die teuflischen Lichter verwirren viele Crewmitglieder, lösen alarmierende Visionen aus und wecken merkwürdige Krankheiten. Nicht einmal {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} kann sich dem Einfluss der heimtückischen, seelenverbrennenden Schönheit entziehen. Eine lange Phase der Migräne steht dem Schiff bevor.
languages.original_text: The devilish illumination confounds many minds, causing alarming visions and awakening strange ailments. Not even the Rogue Trader is capable of overcoming the influence of the insidious, soul-burning beauty. A long period of migraines awaits.

traits.locale_text: Die teuflischen Lichter verwirren viele Crewmitglieder, lösen alarmierende Visionen aus und wecken merkwürdige Krankheiten. Nicht einmal {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} kann sich dem Einfluss der heimtückischen, seelenverbrennenden Schönheit entziehen. Eine lange Phase der Migräne steht dem Schiff bevor.

languages.text: Les lumières diaboliques ébranlent les esprits, suscitant des visions alarmantes et réveillant d'étranges douleurs. Il n'est pas jusqu'{mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} en personne qui ne se laisse gagner par l'influence insidieuse de cette splendeur à vous brûler l'âme. Une longue période de migraines attend l'ensemble de l'équipage.
languages.original_text: The devilish illumination confounds many minds, causing alarming visions and awakening strange ailments. Not even the Rogue Trader is capable of overcoming the influence of the insidious, soul-burning beauty. A long period of migraines awaits.

traits.locale_text: Les lumières diaboliques ébranlent les esprits, suscitant des visions alarmantes et réveillant d'étranges douleurs. Il n'est pas jusqu'{mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} en personne qui ne se laisse gagner par l'influence insidieuse de cette splendeur à vous brûler l'âme. Une longue période de migraines attend l'ensemble de l'équipage.

languages.text: Şeytani ışık; pek çok zihni karıştırıyor, endişe verici görüntülere sebep oluyor ve garip rahatsızlıkları uyandırıyor. Hür Tacir bile sinsi, ruh yakıcı güzelliğine karşı koyamıyor. Uzun bir süre baş ağrısı çekmek zorunda kalıyor.
languages.original_text: The devilish illumination confounds many minds, causing alarming visions and awakening strange ailments. Not even the Rogue Trader is capable of overcoming the influence of the insidious, soul-burning beauty. A long period of migraines awaits.
